#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

typedef struct Score
{
	long long s;
	int id;
} Score;

bool comp(Score a, Score b)
{
	if(a.s == b.s) {
		return a.id < b.id;
	}
	return a.s > b.s;
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int n;
	cin >> n;

	Score S[10004];
	long long s, m;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin >> s >> m;
		S[i].s = s * m;
		S[i].id = i + 1;
	}

	sort(S, S + n, comp);

	int q, k;
	cin >> q;
	while(q--) {
		cin >> k;
		cout << S[k - 1].id << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
